name: Ubiq
short_description: Ubiq offers an enterprise-stable platform by implementing well established and thoroughly tested EVM code.
description: Ubiq is built upon an improved version of the Ethereum Codebase, putting stability at its core. Ubiq offers an enterprise-stable platform by implementing well established and thoroughly tested EVM code. This code, coupled with a conservative upgrade schedule, reduces the risk of network instability and unintended hard-forks.
